org.araneaframework.http.util
Class ServletUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.http.util.ServletUtil
public abstract class ServletUtil
extends Object

Utility methods for Aranea framework running inside a servlet container. Includes functions for rendering JSP pages and direct access to HttpServletResponse and HttpServletRequest.

Author:
"Toomas RÃ¶mer" , Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org), Alar Kvell (alar@araneaframework.org)

Method Detail

include

public static void include(String filePath,
                           Environment env,
                           OutputData output)
                    throws Exception
Includes the jsp specified by filePath using the the request and response streams of the output. The pathname must begin with a "/" and is interpreted as relative to the current context root. The context root in the env under the key ServletContext.class is used.

Throws:
Exception

include

public static void include(String filePath,
                           ApplicationWidget widget,
                           OutputData output)
                    throws Exception
Includes the jsp specified by filePath using the the request and response streams of the output. The pathname must begin with a "/" and is interpreted as relative to the current context root. The context root in the env under the key ServletContext.class is used. Widget is made available to JSP, so contextWidget tag can be used.

Throws:
Exception
Since:
1.1

includeRelative

public static void includeRelative(String filePath,
                                   Environment env,
                                   OutputData output)
                            throws Exception
Includes the jsp specified by file using the the request and response streams of the output. The pathname specified may be relative, although it cannot extend outside the current servlet context. If the path begins with a "/" it is interpreted as relative to the current context root.

Throws:
Exception
